trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Casco
There were no other sightings in Casco on or around August 10th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailson the beach at night during august meteor shower, at least 50-100 other witnesses below object, bright purple lights with white center, could see own reflection on ground during the incident even though it was nighttime, solid black object possibly metallic, similar texture to the monolith in the film "space odyssey 2001" is how i can best describe it. i felt mostly positive feeling (non-threat) i knew instantly it was a black triangle ufo but majority of witnesses believed to be chinese lanterns out of either clear denial or misidentification of ufo due to unfamiliarity with subject. the object seemed to want to be seen or photographed. when the craft finally left, it became invisible in an instant, lights of the craft dimmed to mimic appearance of stars. it was still slightly visible hovering away while cloaked due to the lights mimicking stars yet still moving at same slow pase.
Summary: Silent, large black triangle, hovering slowly tree top level, then became invisible
